title: B2B/DOT: Easy B2B Products - Read Frame Agreements & Place Order with Frame Agreement
description:
Description
The objective of this portfolio epic is to create a new frame agreemen service that enables consumers to read frame agreement information. As a goal a product order for an easy product portfolio with frame agreement reference should be possible.
EOS
Integration into
B2B Agreement API
EOS / O3 / Flamingo
Testing of the new business use case for easy B2B fixed net products with frame agreements
